short_description: This project aims to restore the BETA version of the 2nd gen of the Pokemon games. I propose you to enter the Pokemon World once again, a world of dreams, aventures,with pokemons and odd maps awaiting, let's go!
summary: A Pokemon Gold Beta restoration project
